name: Blobs Adventure
description:
Blob is a spherical space traveller. He has only got one eye, which is perhaps why he has crashed his space ship on Blobland - oh no! Blob must find a new rocket to escape... before the Alienblobs catch him!

Blob's Adventure is a simple and fun tilting maze / labyrinth puzzle game. The game takes you through grassy, rocky, and icy terrains, using pick ups and physics to progress through each level.☆ A "Mario-esque" combination of arcade platform mechanics and puzzle elements

☆ Cute arcade artwork

☆ Stylized 3D graphics

☆ Simple rolling puzzle mechanics.

☆ Bouncy mushrooms

☆ Movable crates

☆ Under-water action

☆ Ramps and platforms

☆ Stars and nuts to collect

☆ The Alienblobs' arsenal includes cars, flying saucers,deathblobs, and giant boots!A mobile version of the game is currently available to install free on Android and iOs. Here are some comments about it:

"With its varied gameplay and imaginative level design Blob's Adventure is a rolling good time."

- SuperGameDroid.com

"The 3D world of Blobland is simple yet vibrant enough to create an atmosphere, and the gameplay does feel like a real adventure."

- PocketMeta.com

"Dying is fun!"

- Hannah and Amelia
